CustomField.formula: CASE( Color__c, "Black","Black", "Black Matte","Black", "All-Black","Black", "Red","Red", "Silver","Silver", "Marine","Marine", "Peach Blue","Peach", "Saffron Gloss","Saffron", "Sage Gloss","Sage", "Coral Gloss","Coral", "Coral","Coral", "Slate Gloss","Slate", "Scarlet","Scarlet", "Cognac","Cognac", "Ocean","Ocean", "Lagoon","Lagoon", "Azure","Azure", "Blush","Blush", "Paprika","Paprika", "Clementine","Clementine", "Honey","Honey", "White","White", "Green","Green", "Titanium","Titanium", "Blue","Blue", "Blue Gloss","Blue", "Blue Matte","Blue", "")
CustomField.label: Color Group
